    • Method Detail

      • topSurveys

        @RequestMapping(value="/topSurveys",
                method=GET,
                headers="Accept=application/json")
public java.util.List<Survey> topSurveys(@RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="time")
                                                                                                                                                             java.lang.String sortBy,
                                                                                                                                                             @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="5")
                                                                                                                                                             java.lang.Integer limit,
                                                                                                                                                             @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="[]")
                                                                                                                                                             java.lang.String options)
        Parameters:
        sortBy - how to sort all surveys
        limit - how many surveys download , default = 5
        options - survey load options
        Returns:
        List of downloaded surveys
        See Also:
        SurveysSort, default = by time to faster loading, DeserializeSurveyOptions, you can control only download users answers or not to sort by user

      • getSurveyById

        @RequestMapping(value="/survey",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getSurveyById(@RequestParam
                                                                                                                             java.lang.Integer id,
                                                                                                                             @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="[]")
                                                                                                                             java.lang.String options)
        Parameters:
        id - id to find survey
        options - survey load options
        Returns:
        status 200 with loaded survey or status 429 if too many connections to database or 400 if incorrect options
        See Also:
        DeserializeSurveyOptions

      • login

        @RequestMapping(value="/login",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> login(@RequestParam
                                                                                                                     java.lang.String login,
                                                                                                                     @RequestParam
                                                                                                                     java.lang.String password,
                                                                                                                     @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="[]")
                                                                                                                     java.lang.String options)
        Parameters:
        login - login to authenticate on server
        password - password to authenticate on server
        options - user load options
        Returns:
        status 200 and loaded user if all is correct , 404 if incorrect login , 400 if incorrect password or incorrect options , 429 if too many connections to database
        See Also:
        DeserializeUserOptions

      • newUser

        @RequestMapping(value="/registration",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> newUser(@RequestParam(value="newUser")
                                                                                                                              java.lang.String JSONUser)
        Parameters:
        JSONUser - JSON string of new user entity to save on database
        Returns:
        200 if new user is correct , 420 if login is contains in database, 422 too short or too long login , 421 too short or too long password 429 if too many connections to database , 400 if bad json string

      • topics

        @RequestMapping(value="/topics",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> topics(@RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="true")
                                                                                                                      java.lang.Boolean downloadSurveys,
                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="time")
                                                                                                                      java.lang.String sortBy,
                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="3")
                                                                                                                      java.lang.Integer limit)
        Parameters:
        downloadSurveys - if you want too download all surveys, contains in topic
        sortBy - type of sorting of all topics and surveys in each topic
        limit - max size of List of surveys in topic
        Returns:
        status 200 and List of topics with list List of surveys or 429 if too many connections to database

      • doneSurvey

        @RequestMapping(value="/doneSurvey",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> doneSurvey(@RequestParam
                                                                                                                               java.lang.String answers,
                                                                                                                               @RequestParam
                                                                                                                               java.lang.Integer id,
                                                                                                                               @RequestParam
                                                                                                                               java.lang.String login)
        Parameters:
        answers - List of Integer with numbers of answers in each question
        id - id of done survey
        login - login of user who dine this survey
        Returns:
        status 200 - alright , status 422 if bad params, 450 if this user already done this survey
